titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the This is the town that was [sound recording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen

did.unittitle: This is the town that was [sound recording].

archdesc.scopecontent: Dramatic production relating to the history of Ann Arbor, Michigan, and presented on the occasion of the city's sesquicentennial.
